projectDescription.defaultValue: A project for the AI Foundry account with network secured deployed Agent

metadata.description: This project will be a sub-resource of your account
The display name of the project
Virtual Network name for the Agent to create new or existing virtual network
The name of Agents Subnet to create new or existing subnet for agents
The name of Private Endpoint subnet to create new or existing subnet for private endpoints
Existing Virtual Network name Resource ID
Address space for the VNet (only used for new VNet)
Address prefix for the agent subnet. The default value is 192.168.0.0/24 but you can choose any size /26 or any class like 10.0.0.0 or 172.168.0.0
Address prefix for the private endpoint subnet
The AI Search Service full ARM Resource ID. This is an optional field, and if not provided, the resource will be created.
The AI Storage Account full ARM Resource ID. This is an optional field, and if not provided, the resource will be created.
The Cosmos DB Account full ARM Resource ID. This is an optional field, and if not provided, the resource will be created.
The API Management Service full ARM Resource ID. This is an optional field for existing API Management services.
Object mapping DNS zone names to their resource group, or empty string to indicate creation
Zone Names for Validation of existing Private Dns Zones
The name of the project capability host to be created

parameters.addressPrefix: [if(empty(parameters('agentSubnetPrefix')), createObject('value', cidrSubnet(reference(extensionResourceId(format('/subscriptions/{0}/resourceGroups/{1}', subscription().subscriptionId, parameters('vnetResourceGroupName')), 'Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworks', parameters('vnetName')), '2024-05-01').addressSpace.addressPrefixes[0], 24, 0)), createObject('value', parameters('agentSubnetPrefix')))]

metadata.description: Name of the virtual network
Name of the subnet
Address prefix for the subnet
Array of subnet delegations

subnetId.value: [resourceId('Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworks/subnets', split(format('{0}/{1}', parameters('vnetName'), parameters('subnetName')), '/')[0], split(format('{0}/{1}', parameters('vnetName'), parameters('subnetName')), '/')[1])]

parameters.addressPrefix: [if(empty(parameters('peSubnetPrefix')), createObject('value', cidrSubnet(reference(extensionResourceId(format('/subscriptions/{0}/resourceGroups/{1}', subscription().subscriptionId, parameters('vnetResourceGroupName')), 'Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworks', parameters('vnetName')), '2024-05-01').addressSpace.addressPrefixes[0], 24, 1)), createObject('value', parameters('peSubnetPrefix')))]

variables.conditionStr: [format('((!(ActionMatches{{''Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/blobServices/containers/blobs/tags/read''}})  AND  !(ActionMatches{{''Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/blobServices/containers/blobs/filter/action''}}) AND  !(ActionMatches{{''Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/blobServices/containers/blobs/tags/write''}}) ) OR (@Resource[Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/blobServices/containers:name] StringStartsWithIgnoreCase ''{0}'' AND @Resource[Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/blobServices/containers:name] StringLikeIgnoreCase ''*-azureml-agent''))', parameters('workspaceId'))]

metadata.description: Name of the AI Search resource
Project name

resources.name: [format('{0}/{1}', parameters('cosmosAccountName'), guid(parameters('projectWorkspaceId'), resourceId('Microsoft.DocumentDB/databaseAccounts/sqlDatabases/containers', parameters('cosmosAccountName'), 'enterprise_memory', variables('userThreadName')), variables('roleDefinitionId'), parameters('projectPrincipalId')))]

[format('{0}/{1}', parameters('cosmosAccountName'), guid(parameters('projectWorkspaceId'), resourceId('Microsoft.DocumentDB/databaseAccounts/sqlDatabases/containers', parameters('cosmosAccountName'), 'enterprise_memory', variables('systemThreadName')), variables('roleDefinitionId'), parameters('projectPrincipalId')))]
